# Hosts data structure format

# Generated by gethistory:
##########################
hdata 					- structure containing all data
hdata.aversion				- Version of analyzed structures generated by analyze
hdata.version				- Version of data structure generated by gethistory
hdata.minstep 				- Minimal time step between item values
hdata.maxstep 				- Maximal time step between item values
hdata.avgstep 				- Avg time step between item values

hdata.<host> 				- Host specific data
hdata.<host>.i<itemid> 			- Item specific data
hdata.<host>.i<itemid>.id 		- Item id
hdata.<host>.i<itemid>.key 		- Item key
hdata.<host>.i<itemid>.delay 		- Item delay
hdata.<host>.i<itemid>.hdata 		- Number of days of history for item (in zabbix, no in file)
hdata.<host>.i<itemid>.x 		- Times in seconds (from 1970) when values were received
hdata.<host>.i<itemid>.y 		- Values of item in x times

hdata.<host>.i<itemid>.events 		- Array of events for this item [[clock,value,priority,triggerid];...]

hdata.t<triggerid> 			- Triggers structure
hdata.t<triggerid>.id 			- Trigger id
hdata.t<triggerid>.expression 		- Trigger expression
hdata.t<triggerid>.description 		- Trigger description
hdata.t<triggerid>.priority 		- Trigger priority


# Generated by normalization
############################
hdata.<host>.i<itemid>.xn 		- Normalized x (same timestep)
hdata.<host>.i<itemid>.yn 		- Normalized data
hdata.minx 				- minimum time in seconds for all data
hdata.maxx 				- maximum time in seconds for all data
hdata.minx2 				- minimum time in seconds for analyze (removing border conditions) 
hdata.maxx2 				- maximum time in seconds for analyze (removing border conditions) 
hdata.isnormalized			- Flag that data are already normalized

# Generated by correlation
##########################
hdata.cm  				- correlation of host items
hdata.<host>.<item>.index=itemid  	- index of item in correlation table
hdata.itemhindex{<itemid>}=<host>	- hostname belonging to index 
hdata.itemkindex{<itemid>}=<key>	- Item key for index
hdata.itemindex{<itemid>}=<host:itemkey>
hdata.<host>.cmvec                      - Correlation vector [index1,index2]=value
hdata.<host>.sortvec                    - Sorted vector of correlation indexes [index]=[maxri,maxci,maxv]
